LanguageData.kuro.label: Dog-eared kuro
LanguageData.kuro.description:
The dog-eared kuros are a friendly species often found alongside the wolf-eared siros. They enjoy collecting herbs for their black teas, which are known for being able to prevent toxic buildups within the body.
While they are generally friendly creatures, a botched taming attempt or an attack will bring out their violent side.
